scripts.migrate:prov: cross-env MIGRATION_MODE=provsql node-pg-migrate -r dotenv/config -j js --database-url-var URL_PROVSQL up
scripts.migrate:gprom: cross-env MIGRATION_MODE=gprom node-pg-migrate -r dotenv/config -j js --database-url-var URL_GPROM up
scripts.down:prov: cross-env MIGRATION_MODE=provsql node-pg-migrate -r dotenv/config -j js --database-url-var URL_PROVSQL down
scripts.down:gprom: cross-env MIGRATION_MODE=gprom node-pg-migrate -r dotenv/config -j js --database-url-var URL_GPROM down
scripts.provsql: docker exec -it provlab psql -U postgres -d provsql_db
